casebody.data:
STATE of Missouri, Respondent,
v.
Sheila A. WALLIS, Appellant. WD 80817 Missouri Court of Appeals, Western District. ORDER FILED: JUNE 4, 2019 Shaun Mackelprang, Jefferson City, MO, Counsel for Respondent. Stephen M. Patton, Kansas City, MO, Counsel for Appellant. Before Division Three: Thomas H. Newton, Presiding Judge, Anthony Rex Gabbert, Judge, Edward R. Ardini, Jr., Judge

ORDER

Per Curiam:

Sheila Wallis appeals her conviction for one count of first degree stalking, Section 565.225, RSMo Cum. Supp. 2008, second or subsequent offense. We affirm. Rule 30.25(b).
